Ningyuan county in Yongzhou 永州[Yong3 zhou1], Hunan

sentences.english: The ancient town of Xingcheng was called Ningyuan in the past. It is a well preserved ancient town built in the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 兴城古城旧称宁远卫城，是一座保存完好的明代古城。

sentences.english: Ningyuan County is a hilly district.
sentences.chinese: 宁远县是一个丘陵地区。

sentences.english: The leaf rather and far and tightly leads long her hand.
sentences.chinese: 叶宁远紧紧地牵着她的手。
